abstract: BP or Royal Dutch Shell might be lining up a $2.5 billion bid for coal-seam gas producer Arrow Energy, The Daily Telegraph reported.
snippet: BP or Royal Dutch Shell might be lining up a $2.5 billion bid for coal-seam gas producer Arrow Energy, The Daily Telegraph reported.
lead_paragraph: On Wednesday, as the energy sector saw a strong recovery from Tuesday’s losses, rumors emerged that BP or Royal Dutch Shell was lining up a bid of 3 billion Australian dollars for a coal-seam gas producer, Arrow Energy, The Daily Telegraph reported.

headline.main: BP or Royal Dutch Shell Said to Make Bid for Arrow
